text: Carolyn Law (born 1951) is an American artist known for her mixed media and public artworks. ==Public art== *2011, Social Intricacy/The Beach, Kirkland Transit Center, Seattle *2010, Wenatchee Sewage Treatment Plant, Wenatchee, Washington *2006, Before Now, Depot Park, Santa Cruz, California *2001 Tonalea Landmarks, Scottsdale, Arizona ==Collections== Works by Law are included in the collections of the Seattle Art Museum and the Washington State Arts Commission. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century American women artists Category:21st-century American women artists
title: Carolyn Law
